Products.name: Apple Macbook Air
Products.description: 2020 Apple MacBook Air Laptop: Apple M1 chip, 13.3-inch/33.74 cm Retina Display, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD Storage, Backlit Keyboard, FaceTime HD Camera, Touch ID. Works with iPhone/iPad

reviews.name: Mark
reviews.comments: If we could get it for around 70-75k with some kind of discount that would b huge.. anyways, super excited.

Products.name: Apple Macbook Pro
Products.description: T2020 Apple MacBook Pro with Apple M1 Chip (13-inch, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD Storage) - Space Gray

reviews.name: Steph
reviews.comments: Apples attention to detail is outstanding. M1 chip wow! Went with space grey to prevent reflection on screen. So many new cool features.

Products.name: Apple Watch series 7
Products.description: Apple Watch Series 7 (GPS + Cellular, 45mm) - (Product) RED Aluminum Case with (Product) RED Sport Band

reviews.name: Steve
reviews.comments: Battery doesn’t last longer than 24 hours. Pain to keep having to charge it

reviews.name: Francis
reviews.comments: I do not have money that I can get a phone but I have a dream to get a phone which will definitely be fulfilled one day

Products.name: Zebronics Zeb Fitness Watch
Products.description: Zebronics Zeb-FIT5220CH Smart Fitness Watch, 2.5D Curved Glass 4.4cm Large Square Display, Metal Body, Dual Menu UI, 7-Day Data Storage, 8 Sports Mode, SpO2, BP & HR Monitor, (Gold)

reviews.name: John
reviews.comments: The smartwatch delivers what it promises. Awesome smooth UI, fitness trackers are not that accurate & reliable but good enough for this price range. The best part is metal bracelet finishing which feels premium.

Products.name: Lenovo Casual Briefcase
Products.description: Lenovo Casual Laptop Briefcase T210 (Toploader) 39.62 cm (15.6-inch) Water Repellent Black

reviews.name: Adam
reviews.comments: It’s a decent bag, delivered in a day. But the price was higher when I purchased and it dropped the next day to ₹729. I bought for a higher price which is very disappointing.
